mapper.select: Select r.role_id as roleId , r.role_name as roleName , count(ul.user_id) as num From role r Left Join user_login ul ON ul.role_id = r.role_id Group By r.role_id Order by r.role_id
Select r.role_id as roleId , r.role_name as roleName from user_login u Left Join role r ON r.role_id = u.role_id Where u.user_id = #{userId}
